doctext.text: Open a port and allocate a region that is defined by parameters.

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: The region can be configured to act as standard memory or can report read/write accesses.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: This peripheral cannot be used in a hardware description used to generate a TLM platform.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: This is not based upon the operation of a real device but is intended to be used for bring up and development of new virtual platforms.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Defines the memory address at which the port is connected.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Defines the size, in bytes, of the port (Default 0x1000).

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Defines the behaviour on an access. The default operation provides a memory area. If this parameter is set all accesses are reported.
